name: Number 97: Dragravion
desc:
2 Level 8 monsters
Your opponent cannot target this card with card effects. You can detach 1 material from this card; you cannot Special Summon other monsters for the rest of this turn, also choose 2 Dragon "Number" monsters with different names from your Extra Deck and/or GY, except "Number 97: Dragravion", Special Summon 1 of them, and if you do, attach the other monster to it as material, also for the rest of this turn, you can only declare an attack with the Summoned monster. You can only use this effect of "Number 97: Dragravion" once per turn.
